title: Cornerstone
description: In the blink of an eye, a life begins & another ends. What do you do when all is lost? When all that’s left is guilt? These are the questions that face Brent Venturi, the leader of the Phantom Squad. His answer—go back to the beginning, to where it all began—Mount Ararat. The last known resting place of Noah’s Ark. What begins as a sabbatical of self-awareness turns into a mission of survival.
author: J.M. LeDuc
